comments:
N20070315-0010
RHEL 4 WS
Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.7.12) Gecko/20060130 Red Hat/1.0.7-1.4.3 Firefox/1.0.7

- Open Eclipse SDK on clean workspace
- Close welcome
- Open help, close help
- Open welcome

Bug: Welcome is empty, workbench stops working properly.
